description: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
author: Dalai Lama

description: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

description: Get busy living or get busy dying.
author: Stephen King

description: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
author: Mae West

description: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
author: Albert Einstein

description: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
author: Babe Ruth

description: Money and success don’t change people; they merely amplify what is already there.
author: Will Smith

description: Not how long, but how well you have lived is the main thing.
author: Seneca

description: The whole secret of a successful life is to find out what is one's destiny to do, and then do it.
author: Henry Ford

description: In order to write about life first you must live it.
author: Ernest Hemingway

description: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
author: Oprah Winfrey

description: The unexamined life is not worth living.
author: Socrates

description: Your time is limited, don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
author: Steve Jobs

description: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right.
author: Henry Ford

description: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
author: Tony Robbins

description: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
author: Confucius

description: Life is a long lesson in humility.
author: James M. Barrie

description: The greatest pleasure of life is love.
author: Euripides

description: Keep smiling, because life is a beautiful thing.
author: Marilyn Monroe

description: The future belongs to those who prepare for it today.
author: Malcolm X

description: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
author: Aristotle

description: Life is made of ever so many partings welded together.
author: Charles Dickens

description: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
author: Oscar Wilde

description: Life is short, and truth works far and lives long.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

description: Everything you can imagine is real.
author: Pablo Picasso

description: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha

description: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

description: If you're going through hell, keep going.
author: Winston Churchill

description: Stay hungry, stay foolish.
author: Steve Jobs

description: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

description: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
author: Chris Grosser

description: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller

description: I never dreamed about success, I worked for it.
author: Estee Lauder

description: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

description: All progress takes place outside the comfort zone.
author: Michael John Bobak

description: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

description: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
author: Bruce Lee

description: Try not to become a man of success, but rather become a man of value.
author: Albert Einstein

description: Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
author: Will Rogers

description: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
author: Ralph Marston

description: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

description: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.
author: Jim Rohn

description: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
author: Tony Robbins

description: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
author: Aristotle

description: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein

description: What we think, we become.
author: Buddha

description: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
author: Albert Einstein

description: Work hard in silence, let success make the noise.
author: Unknown

description: Dream big and dare to fail.
author: Norman Vaughan

description: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
author: Unknown

description: Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done.
author: Unknown

description: Success is not for the lazy.
author: Unknown

description: Great things never come from comfort zones.
author: Unknown

description: Don’t wait for opportunity. Create it.
author: Unknown

description: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
author: Unknown

description: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
author: Unknown

description: Sometimes later becomes never. Do it now.
author: Unknown

description: Little things make big days.
author: Unknown

description: It’s going to be hard, but hard does not mean impossible.
author: Unknown

description: Don’t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.
author: Unknown

description: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
author: Suzy Kassem

description: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

description: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

description: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
author: George Addair

description: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
author: Nelson Mandela

description: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

description: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
author: C.S. Lewis

description: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

description: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walt Disney

description: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

description: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

description: If you don’t like something, change it. If you can’t change it, change your attitude.
author: Maya Angelou

description: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

description: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

description: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
author: Confucius

description: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

description: We become what we think about.
author: Earl Nightingale

description: The best revenge is massive success.
author: Frank Sinatra

description: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
author: Anais Nin

description: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.
author: George S. Patton

description: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
author: Lao Tzu

description: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

description: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
author: Unknown

description: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

description: Today is your opportunity to build the tomorrow you want.
author: Ken Poirot

description: We cannot become what we want by remaining what we are.
author: Max Depree

description: Do the hard work especially when you don’t feel like it.
author: Unknown

description: The man who has confidence in himself gains the confidence of others.
author: Hasidic Proverb

description: The best way out is always through.
author: Robert Frost

description: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill
